name: RB: Axolotl
description:
Taking place in a tank suspended in a cosmic wonderland, five axolotls appear one day from a mysterious, thundering void. They quickly learn they are able to speak with one another, and relationships are formed. However, something is off. Each axolotl seems to possess knowledge they should not know. Foods, and people, and places and concepts...

And obsessions.

Some feel a lot of pain. Some want to inflict pain. Some want to forget pain...

And don't forget about the mysterious [RB].Features
    •A mystery with over 10 hours of content.
    •Press ‘S’ at various points in the story to perform the world's greatest somersault!
    •Choose carefully! There are 40 choices in the game presented in the span of 5 minutes, 38 of which that do absolutely nothing, and 2 that barely do anything.
    •Dynamic movements bursting with personality!
    •Big mood, big emotions, and big axolotls.

Surely, there are many things that can be said, but RB: Axolotl is unlike anything you’ve ever seen before.

Despite its cute art style, the visual novel RB: Axolotl is intended for mature audiences only.
